attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britain is working on tough emissions curbs in the future.
With population said to be going to reach 70 million by 2020, this is laughable.
Emissions are proportionate to people.
Whether CO2 is rising is debatable, and there is much info to show the whole thing is a fabrication.
How can they then cut emissions, yet add millions more people to consume more and emit more?
Its illogical and non-sensical.
So, curb emissions simply by stopping population growth.
Quite how economic growth and increased consumption square with planned reduction also baffles me, seems like the only thing is reduce consumption.
So, petition is for curbing population growth and finding a new economy  not based upon growth, ie more and more consuming every year, do we need to buy more and more?
